body_html:
Actually, based on the architecture of Distributed Strategy, we are pushing its application inside Alibaba and it is the substrate of our so-called "auto-parallel" functionality, any discussion or interaction with people from Google working Distributed Strategy will be highly appreciated.

Thanks
